title: Sub Resistance Up
paragraphs: Sub Resistance Up is an ability in Splatoon 3. It is a successor of Bomb Defense Up DX from Splatoon 2.
Sub Resistance Up reduces effects and damage from sub weapons,[1] but does not protect against special weapons, unlike Bomb Defense Up DX.
Sub Resistance Up is the main ability of:

- Bomb Defense Up DX
Bomb Defense Up
Cold-Blooded
